name: Hit the Clown
description:
You were abducted by a psycho clown, play his game in order to escape.

After fixing the generators every 10 seconds a zathura like arcade machine will play an event. Energy drains every second, good acuracy will help you to replenish it.

Solve the puzzle to this escape room and enjoy the jackpot ticket prize.

Do not let the light above the machine die out.
Do not take long in fixing the generators.

Hee-hee
